original_text: Did any people ever hear the voice of a god speaking out of the midst of the fire, as you have heard, and still live?
korean_text: 어떤 국민이 불 가운데에서 말씀하시는 하나님의 음성을 너처럼 듣고 생존하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Did any people ever hear the voice of a god
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 백성이 신의 음성을 들어본 적이 있느냐

sentences.original_text: speaking out of the midst of the fire
